title: Question about cuda grad
body_html:
import torch a = torch.tensor([1.,2.,3.],requires_grad = True) a = a.cuda() b = a** 2 c = b.mean(0 c.backward() print(a.grad)
None
why 'a.grad' print 'None'?
but,
import torch a = torch.tensor([1.,2.,3.]) a = a.cuda() a.requires_grad = True b = a** 2 c = b.mean(0 c.backward() print(a.grad)
tensor([0.6667,1.3333,2.0000],device = 'cuda:0')
